name: Type Tetris
description:
Overview
In today's world, everybody knows Tetris, this is the next step. Instead of moving the tiles around to get rid of them, you gotta type the word as quickly as you can.
Gameplay
The game is about speed, typing speed in particular. You have to type the words as fast as you can in order to survive. Featuring a difficulty setting you can prove to your friends that you are indeed, the fastest typing one, or  not. 
You can play in two different settings, you can chose between a static difficulty or a steadily increasing difficulty.
